summary: The package provides reusable schema classes and validation utilities for scientific data structures such as xarray and xugrid, enforcing rules on coordinates, dimensions, data types, value ranges, uniqueness, NoData handling, and connectivity. It also includes helper functions that simplify testing of pandas DataFrames by normalizing integer column types and asserting DataFrame equality.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and consistency of geoscientific model inputs and outputs while streamlining automated testing of data processing pipelines.
